tutorial_step1:
Welcome! In this game, you bet on
six horses. Choose your horse and
see who wins!
tutorial_step2:
“Balance” shows your current money
available to bet.
tutorial_step3:
Use the “Bet Amount” field to set
how much you want to wager.
tutorial_step4:
Click the “Deposit” button to add
more funds to your balance.
tutorial_step5:
Press one of the six horse buttons
to place your bet on that horse.
